titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the mayor, aldermen, and Common-Council of Nottingham in St. Peter's Church, on the 14th of Febr. 1688/9 being the thanksgiving day for our deliverance from popery and arbitrary power / by W. Wilson.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
